Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: No event with Topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" there is not an event with Topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Event tns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is property event
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is property event(MessageDescription.IsProperty="true")

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect Source.SimpleItemDescription.Name intns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential event
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Name = "AccessPointToken"
